title: Opening Ceremonies
description: Get to know the staff, Guest of Honor, and what to expect from the day! Hear the rules and special information to help your day at the con run smoothly.

title: Fursuit Fashion Show
description: Show off your fursuit in the fursuit fashion show! Cheer on your fursuiter friends as they walk the runway!

title: Fursuit Games & Photo Room
description: Play some games in fursuit or just watch the silly suiters get up to crazy hijinks! Gte some photos taken of you and your friends! The group photo will happen at 12:15pm.

title: Make Your Own: Galaxy Slime!
description: Make your own space themed slime that you get to take home with you!

title: Super Smash Bros Ultimate Tournament
description: Go head-to-head in this ultimate tournament run by Dr. Calderone and Andi! This will be a double elimination tournament (two brackets: a loser's bracket and a winner's bracket). Controllers are provided.

title: Coffee/Hot Chocolate & Cookie Decorating
description: Come get some coffee/hot chocolate with Dr. Calderone and decorate some cookies made by Griff!

title: DINNER TIME
description: Pizza party!!! Pizza is included in registration fee so its free to eat for all!

title: Furry Jeopardy & Sketchbook Swap
description: Play Furry Jeopardy hosted by Griff and draw some doodles in each other's sketchbooks! Bring your own sketchbooks as they will not be provided.

title: Rave (with DJ Vesper Lux)
description: Rave with Vesper Lux! Glow sticks will be provided!

title: Closing Ceremonies & Clean Up
description: Closing it up and cleaning up the mess from the stimky furries!

title: Bagels and Music
description: Eat some bagels and get dance to some tunes!

title: Depart for P-town from Griff's house
description: Depart for Provincetown promptly at 10:30am. It's a 50min drive.

title: Arrive in Provincetown
description: Meet up at the Grace Hall Parking Lot.

title: DINNER
description: Burgers and Fries (Vegetarian options will be provided).

title: Vesper Lux's Surf Fishing Panel
description: Surf Fishing at the beach with Vesper Lux.

title: Rave and PJ Party
description: Put on your pjs and have a party! there will be a movie on and a rave!
